Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's reminds me. I was tidying up the
other day and I found an old album with
pics of me and you as kids in it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? Really? I want to see it! Make me
a copy, will you?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
No, that's too much hassle.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Come on! I'm not asking for much! You're
as stingy as ever, aren't you?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ah, <MYNAME>! Listen to this. Allen is so
stingy!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Come for some tea too?
<PAGE>
And you, Rod. You can't just suddenly
open up on someone like that! <MYNAME> has
no idea what's going on.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, of course. Sorry <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Allen was just telling me that he found
some pictures of us when we were kids.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh? Didn't we tell you yet? Allen and I
are childhood friends.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Out mothers were great friends, and so
even though we didn't live in the same
town we often visited each other.
<PAGE>
Allen has always been this arrogant, so
se fought quite a lot!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
And you have always been a crybaby! Bad
at studying too.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You haven't changed at all. Still really
horrible to me, too!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You think we're good friends? No at all.
We are just friends of circumstance.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's not true! We're here drinking tea
together, right? Allen treats his
friends pretty well, too.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? That's simply not true.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh dear, have I am embarrassed you?
Even when we were small, you always came
to my rescue right when I needed you!
<PAGE>
You think Allen is a great guy too,
don't you <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, don't bring <MYNAME> into this.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look, <MYNAME> agrees. How nice for you,
Allen!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Enough. I'm leaving. This is just a
waste of time.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey! Come on, Allen!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
He really left. He always does that as
soon as something upsets him. Maybe I
took things a little far.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rod, Rod. This is for you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, Clement?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is yours, is it not? That's what
Allen told me.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's this... an album?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah! I knew it. Allen always thinks
of his friends. I'll have to thank him
later.
